Title: Nine and a Half Months
Plot: Steve panics at Susan goes into labour, Patrick panics as Sally goes Hulk-style mad after finding out he's slept with Jane, who is oblivious to all the tension and is having a blissful afternoon with Oliver.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Samantha Spiro, Sophie Stanton, Vaughan Sivell, Janice Phayre, Jordan Long, Jim Field Smith, Joshua Iredal
